metadata.title: CVE-2016-5384 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
fontconfig before 2.12.1 does not validate offsets, which allows localusers to trigger arbitrary free calls and consequently conduct double freeattacks and execute arbitrary code via a crafted cache file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-5384` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fontconfig - 2.11.94-0ubuntu1.1
fontconfig-config - 2.11.94-0ubuntu1.1
libfontconfig1 - 2.11.94-0ubuntu1.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: fontconfig package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.11.94-0ubuntu1.1').
